zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns

Class RainbowPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.Pattern
      • zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.RainbowPattern

  • public class RainbowPattern
extends Pattern
    The RainbowPattern class represents a pattern across the cloud's whole led-matrix. It uses a static list with gradually changing colors, that imitates the colors of a rainbow, to display a portion of this list across the cloud, parallel to the x-axis. The density of the colors and the velocity the pattern travels across the x-axis, can be set upon instantiation.
    Author:
    Zyklone

      • RainbowPattern

        public RainbowPattern(int pictureSizeX,
                      int pictureSizeY,
                      float velocity,
                      int density)
        This constructor initializes the Pattern with the passed velocity and density.
        Parameters:
        pictureSizeX - the length in the x-axis of the led-matrix
        pictureSizeY - the length in the y-axis of the led-matrix
        velocity - the velocity the pattern travels across the cloud's x-axis
        density - the density of the rainbow-colors that are displayed on the cloud.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

      • getNextPicture

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color>> getNextPicture()
        Calculates and returns the next picture. The new position of the pattern is dependent on the time passed since the last calculation.
        Specified by:
        getNextPicture in class Pattern
        Returns:
        the last calculated picture of this pattern.
